I have developed two open source textbooks using the R **bookdown** package.  Both are linked below.  The graduate text is the companion for PSCI 6920, Political Analysis II.  The undergraduate text is the companion for PSCI 3590, Data for Politics and Policy.

- Undergraduate course: <https://jkcorder.github.io/docs/>
  
- Graduate course: <https://jkcorder.github.io/docs/books/>
